Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The results indicated that exercise reduced the mortality associated with the effects of large dosages of isoproterenol but had little on the severity of the infarction .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| exercise |
| large dosages of isoproterenol |

Note: I included "exercise" as a chemical because it is a form of physical energy that can be studied chemically. Isoproterenol is a specific type of medication that is used as a drug to stimulate the heart.
